attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to congratulate the Prime Minister on the epitome of his achievement of 10 years of his stewardship of the economy in becoming the Chairman of Northern Rock. It is a fitting tribute of his performance in maximising the National Debt, and the imbalance of trade and developing our economy with Europe as the only continent where we have an imbalance of trade.
Add to that that we are now at the bottom of league of private pensions just above Greece. Congratulations and well done Prime Minister. 

Well worth waiting for.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
